songs.title: Midnight (Kygo Remix)
songs.lyrics:
In the darkness
Before the dawn
In the swirling
Of the storm
When I'm rolling with the punches
And hope is gone
Leave a light, a light on

Millions of miles from home
In the swirling
Swimming on
When I'm rolling with the thunder
But bleed from thorns
Leave a light, a light on
Leave a light, a light on
